[[inst_sw_smax]]
==== SW.SMAX

*Syntax:* sw.smax<.{rl, f, rlf}> [SrcL], SrcR

*Description:* Atomic Signed Max operation: memory value is atomically signed maxed with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_sw_smax.svg[SW.SMAX encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
